name: The sum of all principal amounts in the schedule entries equals the total loan amount

children.description: Given details of "5000.0","5.0",'12' and "2018-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload
When user invoke rest service to generate Plan
Then validate sum of all principal amounts equals the total "5000.0" amount
Given details of "1200.0","2.0",'10' and "2019-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload
When user invoke rest service to generate Plan
Then validate sum of all principal amounts equals the total "1200.0" amount

userStory.storyName: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases

title: The sum of all principal amounts in the schedule entries equals the total loan amount

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given details of "<loanAmount>","<nominalRate>",'<duration>' and "<startDate>" to create generate Plan request payload
When user invoke rest service to generate Plan
Then validate sum of all principal amounts equals the total "<loanAmount>" amount
